product_name: SkirtSports Skirt Breaker Vest - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made from wind- and water-resistant fabric, the Skirt Sports Skirt Breaker vest means you don't have to let a little bit of weather keep you from your workout. Shiny, transparent fabric lets your race day outfit show through; lightweight polyester dries quickly. Back of the Skirt Breaker vest includes a mesh-lined cape vent and rear zipper stash pocket. Internal windflap; hem drawcord; chin guard. Closeout.
short_description: Made from wind- and water-resistant fabric, the Skirt Sports Skirt Breaker vest means you don't have to let a little bit of weather keep you from your workout.
